summary: Count Drago invites entertainers to his castle, but what the people don't know is that Drago mummifies animals and humans.
cast: Christopher Lee|Gaia Germani|Philippe Leroy|Mirko Valentin|Donald Sutherland|Antonio De Martino|Renato Terra|Luigi Bonos|Ennio Antonelli|Jacques Stany|Luciano Pigozzi|David de Keyser|Michael Reeves|Robert Rietty
director: Directors: Warren Kiefer, Luciano Ricci (as Herbert Wise)
title: Il castello dei morti vivi
